overview:
Cory Bergman is the director of new product development for msnbc.com, which recently acquired EveryBlock.com, a company that provides news at the neighborhood and block level.

Separately, Cory is the co-founder of Next Door Media, a network of neighborhood news sites in Seattle – the first of its kind in the country. The network includes the popular My Ballard, which won a 2009 Online Journalism Award for community collaboration.
